name: explorative
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
done in order to discover more about something, or with the intention of discovering new things: The oil company has had some success with explorative drilling in the area. She has always been known for being artistically explorative in her work. Synonym
exploratoryRelated word
explore
More examplesFewer examplesAn explorative study was conducted with patients in the clinic.A preliminary explorative analysis was performed before the main project began. At this stage, the investigation is mainly explorative, as it uses only a very small sample.Our explorative work suggests that the effect has been underestimated.He produced a series of musically explorative documentaries about the composer.
